description: For Valkey engine version 7.2 onwards and Redis OSS 6.0 to 7.1: Creates a user group. For more information, see Using Role Based Access Control (RBAC)

parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the user group.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: Sets the engine listed in a user group. The options are valkey or redis.

parameters.name: UserIds
parameters.description: The list of user IDs that belong to the user group. (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to be added to this resource. A tag is a key-value pair. A tag key must be accompanied by a tag value, although null is accepted. Available for Valkey and Redis OSS only. (dict) --- A tag that can be added to an ElastiCache cluster or replication group. Tags are composed of a Key/Value pair. You can use tags to categorize and track all your ElastiCache resources, with the exception of global replication group. When you add or remove tags on replication groups, those actions will be replicated to all nodes in the replication group. A tag with a null Value is permitted. Key (string) --- The key for the tag. May not be null. Value (string) --- The tag's value. May be null.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag's value. May be null.

nested_items.name: UserGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates user group status. Can be 'creating', 'active', 'modifying', 'deleting'.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The options are valkey or redis.

nested_items.name: UserIds
nested_items.description: The list of user IDs that belong to the user group.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum engine version required, which is Redis OSS 6.0

nested_items.name: PendingChanges
nested_items.description: A list of updates being applied to the user group.

nested_items.name: UserIdsToRemove
nested_items.description: The list of user IDs to remove.

nested_items.name: UserIdsToAdd
nested_items.description: The list of user IDs to add.

nested_items.name: ReplicationGroups
nested_items.description: A list of replication groups that the user group can access.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCaches
nested_items.description: Indicates which serverless caches the specified user group is associated with. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user group.
